title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the image is not getting refreshed when the same image is imported again.
EB: Importing the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout should refresh the image and display the new image instead of the original image.
SR:
1. Open the layout that contains an image.
2. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
3. Confirm that the original image is displayed.
4. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
5. Verify that the new image is displayed instead of the original image.
